item.title: Macbook Pro Insomnia
item.description: For a number of years now I have a MacBook Pro Silicon M1 Max. It worked beautifully. Then, seemingly out of nowhere, I started noticing that the battery drained over night when I left the notebook somewhere, not connected to power. This got worse and worse, up until the point that I‚Äôve had enough of it and I started doing some research. On MacOS, the terminal command pmset -g log shows the logs related to power management.
